sentences.en: After failing a singing audition at the Metro-politan Opera, she turned to musical comedy.
sentences.cn: 在大都会歌剧院的试唱失败后，她转而投身歌舞喜剧。

sentences.en: An applicant will then be notified of a day for audition.
sentences.cn: 其后申请者将获通知试音日期.

sentences.en: Apparently he made a mess of his audition.
sentences.cn: 看样子他把试镜搞砸了。

sentences.en: At first, they said he was too young, but later they called him for an audition.
sentences.cn: 起初, 他们说他太小, 但后来他们叫他去试听.

sentences.en: Ben takes one lousy walk in the park and gets an audition?
sentences.cn: 班去公园随便散个步就有试镜自动送上门!

sentences.en: Candidates please collect audition cloth at registration counter and return after interview.
sentences.cn: 考生请索取面试号码布,并于面试后交还.

sentences.en: Economic duty audition the some accomplishments in our country.
sentences.cn: 我国经济责任审计取得了一些业绩.

sentences.en: I'm going to the audition but I don't expect I'll get a part.
sentences.cn: 我去试音,可并不指望会给我个角色演出.

sentences.en: Information on unsuccessful applicants will be destroyed after the audition.
sentences.cn: 未获取录的申请人资料将于面试结束后全部销毁.

sentences.en: It's your audition from this morning! Can I use the phone?
sentences.cn: 是你今天早上的试演, 可以借用你的电话 吗 ?

sentences.en: Please pay the $ 15 entry fee at the audition site.
sentences.cn: 15元报名费请在海选现场缴纳.

sentences.en: She wrote to Paramount Studios and asked if they would audition her.
sentences.cn: 她写信给派拉蒙电影公司，询问他们是否同意让她去试镜。

sentences.en: So that means tomorrow I've got to audition for the school play.
sentences.cn: 这也就是说,我明天就得去为这个学校的戏剧会演试镜了.

sentences.en: The device can be clinically applied tothe audition test of the infant.
sentences.cn: 结论:该仪器可以作为临床婴幼儿听力检测的检测仪器.

sentences.en: What do I need to prepare for my audition?
sentences.cn: 我需要为试镜准备 什么 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 向…试唱，试演；参加…面试；面试

trans.tran_en: An audition is a short performance given by an actor, dancer, or musician so that a director or conductor can decide if they are good enough to be in a play, film, or orchestra
to take part in an audition
